title: UTAC V3 Beta Bootstrap Estimates
description: Bootstrap confidence intervals (1000 iterations) for the six UTAC V3 real-world systems. WAIS/AMOC/Coral reflect mock-bootstrap fits; Measles/Finance/Cancer remain expected pending data ingestion.

threshold_parameters.R: system activation fraction derived from bootstrap counts
threshold_parameters.zeta: Damped when live data replaces mocks within two sprints.

placeholders.blocking: Awaiting PHAC vaccination + incidence data feed
Need BIS cross-border stress dataset cleaning
